overview: A lonely woman who falls in love with the man of her dreams; Elvis Presley. Elvis appears to Edi on her living room television and whispers sweet nothings that only she can hear. He even dazzles her with a real cubic zirconia ring. But when he promises to come to visit Edi, she must wait to see if the man of her dreams will appear in reality.
tagline: Maybe imaginary love is better than the real thing.
title: Hue Quilted Windowpane
